abstract: InBev‘s $52 billion deal to buy St. Louis-based Anheuser-Busch hit a snag this week, when the Belgian brewer announced that it was forced to postpone a $9.8 billion rights offering intended to help fund the purchase.
lead_paragraph: InBev‘s $52 billion deal to buy St. Louis-based Anheuser-Busch hit a snag this week, when the Belgian brewer announced that it was forced to postpone a $9.8 billion rights offering intended to help fund the purchase.
